name: Living Room (Woonkamer)
description: A spacious, light-filled living area with large windows overlooking the garden. Perfect for relaxing and entertaining guests.

name: Bedroom (Slaapkamer)
description: A comfortable bedroom with ample space and natural light. Features include built-in wardrobes and a peaceful atmosphere.

name: Bathroom (Badkamer)
description: A well-appointed bathroom with modern fixtures and finishes. Includes a shower and all necessary amenities.

name: Balcony (Balkon)
description: A private balcony offering beautiful views and outdoor space. Perfect for morning coffee or evening relaxation.
